content.rendered:
Have questions not listed here? Contact our team and we’ll be happy to help:

What is Smart NFT?

Smart NFT is a platform that allows creators and businesses to quickly and efficiently launch an NFT project without any coding knowledge necessary. All you need to install and activate the SmartNFT plugin and the Deploy Contract and create NFTs.

Which Chains are supported?

Smart NFT currently support ERX-721 token standards. You can see supported chain list here : https://wpsmartnft.com/docs/features/

Does it supports scan networks?

Yes.It supports. You can scan network links in the single NFT description tabs.
